description.p: A simple and fast app to manage files stored online. Easily connect to popular cloud storage services and move files between your computer and the cloud.

ul.li: Browse files and folders
Upload and download files
Drag and drop uploads
Upload large files reliably
See upload progress in real time

description.p: Works with AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO, and other compatible cloud storage services.

ul.li: Make encryption passphrase required to setup fixing a bug where you would not be able to setup a passphrase in the case you did not set one up initially.
Fixed sorting and filters resetting when refreshing or creating a folder
Added keyboard navigation for the file browser (Arrow Up/Down to browse, Enter to open, Escape to deselect)
Added keyboard shortcuts for refresh (F5, Ctrl/Cmd+R) and delete (Delete/Backspace)
Fixed a crash when triggering multiple downloads simultaneously
Delete now shows a confirmation dialog before removing files or folders
Single click selects a file, double click opens/downloads
Fix release versioning
Fixed release notes extraction on Windows
Does not allow for files to be encrypted without a passphrase
Simplify release process
Added end-to-end encryption for file uploads and downloads
Added encryption toggle in the upload overlay UI
Improved S3 multipart upload reliability and error handling
Fixed a colouring issue on Linux
Adds the option to share files via a presigned url
Fixed a critical bug with multipart uploads
Fixed a bug where you could not upload multiple files at once
Moved credential storage to the system keyring via Secret Service
Removed secrets from on-disk configuration files
Improved settings flow to safely update credentials without re-entering them
Fixed repeated password prompts caused by legacy configuration data
Improved downloads with progress indicators
Fixed multiple issues when using MinIO storage
Fixed a startup issue affecting some NVIDIA GPU setups
